parameter.title: S1Data Input Output Folder of step 2..7
parameter.abstract: Define the S1Data rootOutputFolder L0,L1,L2,L3,L4,L5 levels

parameter.title: Product subswath
parameter.abstract: Define the subswath of the product to be processed with SNAP

parameter.title: Crop AOI extent
parameter.abstract: Crop AOI extent expressed as LonMin,LatMin,LonMax,LatMax in Decimal Degrees coordinates (e.g. 14.20,37.01,14.45,37.18)

parameter.title: Patch AOI extent
parameter.abstract: Patch AOI extent expressed as LonMin,LatMin,LonMax,LatMax in Decimal Degrees coordinates (e.g. 14.245,37.027,14.306,37.055)

parameter.title: Inter-Image Coherence Threshold
parameter.abstract: Define the minimum coherence for targets to be included in the final product

parameter.title: Mean Velocity Offset
parameter.abstract: Offset in mm/yr to be added to the mean velocity of the coherent targets

parameter.title: Height Offset
parameter.abstract: Offset in meters to be added to the height of the coherent targets

parameter.title: Latitude Offset
parameter.abstract: Offset in decimal degrees to be added to the latitude of the coherent targets

parameter.title: Longitude Offset
parameter.abstract: Offset in decimal degrees to be added to the longitude of the coherent targets

parameter.title: Maximum Velocity Value for palette saturation of KML maps
parameter.abstract: Define the maximum velocity (in mm/yr, in absolute value) for colorbar saturation of KML velocity maps

parameter.title: Threshold on the Mean Velocity for Displacement Trend Generation
parameter.abstract: Displacement trends will be generated only for coherent targets with mean velocity higher than the threshold specified by the user (in absolute value), expressed in mm/yr

workflow.title: PSC - Patch Processing and Final Delivery
workflow.abstract: SPINUA-Step FD: Patch Processing and Final Delivery Selection of one or more patches within the AOI and generation of the displacement maps. This will involve the identification of the position of additional PSC by exploiting the phase of the SAR interferograms (Atmospheric Phase Screen Estimation and Removal - Inter-Image Analysis and estimation of velocity/dem-error after APS removal - Displacement Trend generation and conversion to KML and SHP formats). All these steps are performed for each patch selected by the user.
